com.qualcomm.ftcrobotcontroller.opmodes

Class AutonomousLinearBotmk2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
        • com.qualcomm.ftcrobotcontroller.opmodes.AutonomousLinearBotmk2
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutonomousBlueBotmk2, AutonomousRedBotmk2

    public abstract class AutonomousLinearBotmk2
extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
    contains all the code to run Autonomous, it has no inherent side

      • drive

        void drive(float distance,
         double speed,
         boolean avoidance,
         boolean correction)
     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        uses encoders, ultrasonic sensors and gyro sensors to drive accurately encoders are used for distance ultrasonic sensors do collision avoidance blocked()
        Parameters:
        distance - distance to travel in encoder clicks
        speed - speed to travel at
        avoidance - if true, it will use collision avoidance
        correction - if true, it will do gyro aided corce correction
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • drive

        void drive(float distance,
         double speed)
     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        runs drive(float, double, boolean, boolean) without needing to input collision avoidance or course correction
        Parameters:
        distance - distance to travel in encoder clicks
        speed - speed to travel at
        Throws:
